chapters.title: Chapter 9: Leavetakings
chapters.info: Nieda Sidoro, p. 156 (137)—Innkeeper of Easing the Badger, an inn in Illian. Bayle Domon receives an offer to sail from Mayene to Tear (for a hefty sum) there. When Domon leaves on this voyage, his ship is captured by the Seanchan. See also Domon, Bayle.
